data.title: Kay Kendall
data.text:
AKA Justine Kay Kendall-McCarthy

Born: 21-May-1926

Birthplace: Withernsea, Yorkshire, England

Died: 6-Sep-1959

Location of death: London, England

Cause of death: Cancer - Leukemia

Remains: Buried, St. John-at-Hampstead Churchyard, London, England

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Les Girls

Father: Terry McCarthy (vaudevillian)

Brother: Cavan Kendall (her half-brother, actor, b. 1942, d. 30-Oct-1999)

Husband: Rex Harrison (actor, m. 23-Jun-1957, until her death)

Golden Globe 1958 for Les Girls

Rhinoplasty

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Once More, With Feeling! (11-Feb-1960)

The Reluctant Debutante (14-Aug-1958) · Sheila Broadbent

Les Girls (3-Oct-1957) · Lady Sybil Wren

The Adventures of Quentin Durward (23-Nov-1955) · Isabelle, Countess of Marcroy

Simon and Laura (22-Nov-1955)

The Constant Husband (16-May-1955)

Abdulla the Great (1-Feb-1955)

Doctor in the House (4-Oct-1954) · Isobel

Fast and Loose (Feb-1954) · Carol Hankin

Meet Mr. Lucifer (30-Nov-1953)

Genevieve (30-Oct-1953) · Rosalind Peters

The Square Ring (13-Jul-1953)

The Shadow Man (Apr-1953)

Man in Hiding (10-Mar-1953)

It Started in Paradise (28-Oct-1952)

Curtain Up (12-May-1952)

Wings of Danger (1-Apr-1952)

Lady Godiva Rides Again (25-Oct-1951)

Dance Hall (Jun-1950)

London Town (30-Sep-1946)
